name: The Spirit of the Software
description:
The Spirit of the Software Have you ever wondered what the game you play feels or thinks? Probably not, but you should. Games have feelings and thoughts. 

Fantastic Humans gives you an unique opportunity to talk to a software spirit. 

Maybe you think it is impossible that software has a soul, but if humans can have souls, why programs can not? 

Find out yourself. 

Respect games. They deserve it. 

Music: Turn This Off Please by Nine Inch Nails /CC BY

Game is part of Absurd Games Jam.
